title: Your main needs a nerf.
body:
Your main is overpowered, no one likes playing against your main, I'm a good player and when I play against your main I don't feel like I'm getting outplayed, I feel like they are just using a broken unfun champion.

I mean, they have a Q, a W, an E, and an R, and on top of that they even have a passive. no champion needs so many things in their kit, its just so unfair when they use R, there is no counterplay at all when they use their passive, how am I supposed to dodge their passive?

A good way to nerf your main would be to remove their passive and r, becuase those are the things that I think are making your main really broken.

also I won't listen to any of those people defending your main, they are just maining them and therefore are completely blind to the truth of how unfair it is to play against.

replies.body: It's not my main that's OP, it's their synergy with items. I don't know what Riot was thinking, allowing them to buy 6 items! Obviously that's broken. I'm certain my main would be balanced if Items were just removed from the game. I mean, HotS doesn't have items, so clearly League would be more balanced without items.

So...

We nerf your main...

and all the items your main uses?

Yup, that sounds good.

I vote we just nerf the items and "compensate" the Champion.

tfw your main becomes 100% worthless without passive and R {{champion:29}}
That feeling when they don't really change at all with the removal of passive and R {{champion:17}}

It hurts. {{champion:420}}
Listen man, you obviously don't know how to play against a melee-ranged-dps-assassin-tank-splitpush-teamfighter. Come back to boards when you get gud, skrub.
Are you talking about an actual champ here?
{{champion:104}}
{{champion:64}}
Lee sin is ranged now...
He's clearly talking about the only ranged melee tanky dps assassin mage tank support jungler in the game
{{champion:64}} ?
my main needs a rework cuz the one they gave him is shit
{{champion:72}} ???
{{champion:57}}
oh... Well, I mean, really its not that bad... is it?

im my opinion its not horrible ( i dont fukin like it )  i do zero damage ... but my main issue with it is the travel speed of ult if it was just faster and could be used easier... 

that being said im really figured out you use his ult to zone a team to pick one play out that got out of position or you wait til a team commits on to you in a fight (ideally in tight spaces) and then use it to counter engage but never less ITS TOO FUKIN SLOW

but with him having a 45% average win rate for the last 6-7patches... i maintain a 56% win rate with him

Maokai does alot of dmg imo. 
That or maybe its just cause im bronze. (technically unranked)
I've had game where i've done more damage than the adc.
If they were to just nerf him that would be totally better. I mean nerfs create counterplay right? more of them is better.

nerfs is a reduction of stats not a way to counterplay. 

counterplay is know how and when to engage and go for trades vs champs due to passives, cds, items etc not being available to that champ at that moment. or knowing the champs weakness to attack them... such as adcs is to all in them and dive them... dont let them kite you around...  and so on 

nerfing something dont provide counter play it is just a way to make things which seem strong come in line with other things in game
you said nerf and counterplay in the same sentence, that means nerfs = counterplay.

whatever you need to make yourself seem right 

feel free

you used your and right in the same sentence

that means I'm right. woohoo, glad you agree.
You're in memes and games.
The fact that he can deal damage AND is capable of movement is frankly ridiculous. There is no reason any champion should be able to do both.

{{champion:30}} too strong?
for the R complaints...

Oh, and lets not forget the most important counter, _go back to base before trading with me will bring you low enough to ult dumbass._

aaaaaaaaand for the passive no counterplay complaints? Well... with the general intelligence of people around my elo there might as well not be any.
{{champion:30}} Just {{champion:30}} Walk {{champion:30}} Away {{champion:30}} You {{champion:30}} Idiots {{champion:30}}

So, what you're saying is...

We need to take away another ability, too, since Karthus' ult is useless anyways? How about Q? It's not fair that Karthus has 2 types of basic attacks!
I mean, that can be said by almost all damaging ultimates.
And how many of them have a 3 second long cast time that gives the enemy an exact timer right above their head?
How does Swain and Kallista's kit counter Karthus ult?

Swain ult makes it very difficult to get him low enough to ult. In general Swain is just a pain in the ass for karthus to deal with becuase he's tankier, has a ton of healing, and comparable damage early levels. Karthus doesn't have a really good chance at fighting him post 6 until it's really late game if Swain isn't behind. 

Kalista's ult can save the support, makes them untargetable.
